entry.title: Create SVG donut charts with Javascript

link.title: Create SVG donut charts with Javascript

entry.content:
Last week I had to create both backend and frontend (a Vue.js component) for a piece of software that, amongst other things, monitors file uploads and processing. The eye candy was already in place and it mainly revolved around donuts created with Chart.js.

The problem, as I later found out, was that Vue doesn’t cope well with Chart.js, or at least not in the way I was supposed to use it. Eventually, after a fair amount of .nextTick()s and cursing, everything kinda fell into place.

While I was struggling to make it work, I couldn’t stop thinking that there must be a better way to draw a reactive donut chart without some bulky library that forces Vue to behave as it shouldn’t.

Enter the SVG arc
